```{r}
library(quarto)

quarto_create("my_quarto_project")

# Create a new grid page
quarto_page("grid", "My Grid Page",
  quarto_grid(
    quarto_grid_item(
      title = "How opinions about the war in Ukraine are dividing Jewish friends and families in Canada",
      content = quarto_html("<iframe src='https://thecjn.ca/perspectives/how-opinions-about-the-war-in-ukraine-are-dividing-jewish-friends-and-families-in-canada/'></iframe>")
    ),
    quarto_grid_item(
      title = "Historical Revisionism in Russian State Media: How the Kremlin Weaponizes Nostalgia and Impacts Collective Memory (March 2022)",
      content = quarto_html("<iframe src='https://eurasiatique.ca/2022/04/04/media-as-memory-makers-an-analysis-of-how-kremlin-funded-media-outlets-weaponize-nostalgia-and-impact-collective-memory/'></iframe>")
    ),
    quarto_grid_item(
      title = "The Holocaust That Never Happened",
      content = quarto_html("<iframe src='https://www.tabletmag.com/sections/arts-letters/articles/holocaust-that-never-happened-babi-yar'></iframe>")
    )
  )
)

# Preview your page
quarto_serve()

# Customize the styling using CSS
quarto_style("
  iframe {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    border: none;
  }
")

# Build and deploy your Quarto website
quarto_build()

```
